lead_paragraph: Nico Rosberg was handed a much-needed break in the Formula One title battle which he duly converted by winning Sunday’s Belgian Grand Prix, but victory could have tasted much sweeter for the German.    Rosberg went into the weekend knowing this was his race to lose.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Podium Sours Rosberg’s Belgian Win
headline.main: Hamilton Podium Sours Rosberg’s Belgian Win
